creator: davidw@apache.org
text:
New .spec file builds RPM's, but without a redhat box, I'm unable to really test
them out/perfect them.

creator: bondolo@jxta.org
text:
you may wish to look at jpackage.org which builds RPMs of ant and many other
projects.
jpackage is for Java though, which WebSH definitely isn't:-)
creator: davidw@apache.org

text:
There will not be any rpm for 3.0.0
There might be a working rpm in the future, but currently, 
only source targets are shipped.
(Binary releases might follow, but don't hold your breath.)
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch
